Question
========

We write the names of 50 students on pieces of paper put them in a box. The teacher wants three questions to be answered by students who will be drawn at random. We grab a name for each of the three questions without putting them back. What is then the probability that Marja will be chosen to answer the first question? (Give your answer in the form of a fraction: X/Y).

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 0.02
